thread.title: Controversial comic Nicole Arbour recalls being a Sunshine Girl Entertain
thread.title_full: Controversial comic Nicole Arbour recalls being a Sunshine Girl | TV | Entertain

author: torontosun.com
title: Controversial comic Nicole Arbour recalls being a Sunshine Girl Entertain
text:
Our archive of Sunshine Girls and Sunshine Boys can sometimes contain some funny surprises. Last year, we discovered that Dwayne ‘The Rock’ Johnson was once a Sunshine Boy, and his photo included a hilarious throwback outfit – including mom jeans, a turtleneck and a fanny pack. Former wrestler Chris Jericho also confessed to being a Sunshine Boy in an interview with us last winter.
Now, it’s YouTube star Nicole Arbour’s turn.
“Oh my god, it’s hilarious and embarrassing,” says Arbour about her multiple stints as a Sunshine Girl. “It’s funny, because I sometimes see the photographer who took the photos on red carpets, and we just have a funny connection – because we remember.”
We’ve found two Arbour photos in our system from 2005 – one shows the comedian in a tiny bikini, and the other one features her wearing bright orange workout gear. In the biographic information embedded with the pictures, she says her hobbies are “standup comedy, dancing and running,” and she says her goal is to become “comedian of the year.”
Watch Nicole Arbour's controversial 'Dear Fat People'
